tasks.task: Laying Polly Pipe in a bean field for irrigation.
subtasks: Checking the weather conditions before starting the task.
Ensuring safety in the work area.
Flexing and stretching to prepare for physical labor.
Following a tractor to create a ditch for the Polly Pipe.
Manually placing dirt onto the Polly Pipe to prevent it from being blown away by wind.
Turning a lever to activate the water supply from the well.
Using a tool (poker) to create poppers (holes) in the Polly Pipe to allow water to flow into the field.
Recyling the Polly Pipe after completing the irrigation task.
